channel.title: Dance – Vamos a Bailar
channel.description: A traveling blog for discovering South America

item.title: Quito, the nice Ecuador capital
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Quito The historical city center of Quito was beautiful. It was clean and with a lot of colors. The nice weather probably helped. The center was neither crowded nor polluted. Not only during the day but by night also, the city kept gorgeously. The only point was that the city was empty and everything closed […]

The post Quito, the nice Ecuador capital appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Cuenca & the Ingapirca ruin
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Cuenca A marvelous city I really loved this city. Rather quiet and the city center was beautiful. At each corner, I found nice buildings. My hostel was a bit away from the city center. However, a bit high, I could see the whole city where the churches dominated the whole. Feria in Cuenca During the […]

The post Cuenca & the Ingapirca ruin appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: One day in Valparaiso & Viña del Mar
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
I arrived at 8 in the morning in Santiago from Pucon. My friend took me from the terminal and we went to his home. Just the time to change me and ate a breakfast. Next, we took the car directly to Valparaiso. After one hour of driving in a dry landscape, we reached the city. […]

The post One day in Valparaiso & Viña del Mar appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.
